hubble.title: Cosmic Breathing
hubble.description: Explores Hubble-tension diagnostics with phase sampling and observed |H0| magnitudes.

evaporation.title: Evaporation Lab
evaporation.description: Models unitary black-hole decay and its implications for information retention.

lattice.title: URM Lattice
lattice.description: Discrete spacetime-action lattice model used as a numerical framework.

galaxy.title: Galaxy Rotation
galaxy.description: Galaxy-rotation fits in a sigma_P coupling model (without a dark-matter term in this setup).

entropy.title: Entropy Holo-Lab
entropy.description: Visualizes holographic entropy proxies and information-density scaling.

motor.title: Kinematic Motor
motor.description: Action-tick dynamics (N=E*t/hbar) linking quantum action flow to macroscopic braking in the model.

answer42.title: The Answer is 42
answer42.description: Douglas Adams easter egg (The Answer is 42), not a physics model.

dipole.title: Cosmic Dipole
dipole.description: Examines a reported 3.7x velocity excess under a spacetime-grid friction hypothesis.
